scripts.build-prod-addin-outlook: ng build --project "addin-outlook" --configuration production && mv dist-addin/assets/office-js/agaveerrorux dist-addin/assets/office-js/AgaveErrorUX && mv dist-addin/assets/office-js/AgaveErrorUX/agaveerrorux.js dist-addin/assets/office-js/AgaveErrorUX/AgaveErrorUX.js && mv dist-addin/assets/office-js/AgaveErrorUX/style/agaveerrorux.css dist-addin/assets/office-js/AgaveErrorUX/style/AgaveErrorUX.css
scripts.build-addin-outlook: ng build --project "addin-outlook" && mv dist-addin/assets/office-js/agaveerrorux dist-addin/assets/office-js/AgaveErrorUX && mv dist-addin/assets/office-js/AgaveErrorUX/agaveerrorux.js dist-addin/assets/office-js/AgaveErrorUX/AgaveErrorUX.js && mv dist-addin/assets/office-js/AgaveErrorUX/style/agaveerrorux.css dist-addin/assets/office-js/AgaveErrorUX/style/AgaveErrorUX.css
scripts.build-release: npm run build-prod && npm run build-prod-addin-outlook && npm run reload-packages-prod && npm run reload-packages-prod-addin-outlook
scripts.reload-packages: rm -Rf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm config set legacy-peer-deps true && npm ci
scripts.reload-packages-addin-outlook: cd plugins/addin-outlook && rm -Rf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm config set legacy-peer-deps true && npm ci && cd ../..
scripts.reload-packages-prod: rm -Rf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm config set legacy-peer-deps true && npm ci --production
scripts.reload-packages-prod-addin-outlook: cd plugins/addin-outlook && rm -Rf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm config set legacy-peer-deps true && npm ci --production && cd ../..
scripts.create-component: echo Component name ? && read varname && ng g c $varname --module app --style=scss --project=maarchCourrier
scripts.create-component-admin: echo Component name ? && read varname && ng g c administration/$varname --module administration --style=scss --project=maarchCourrier
